subject: Mr. Nicolas de Rivière
body:
Mr. Nicolas de Rivière
Permanent Representative of France to the United Nations) United
States of America
YOUR CONTRACT FUND
Attention: Beneficairy
This is to inform you that we have finally concluded by paying your
contract fund through RAW GOLD AND CASH  $5.5M .Our Diplomat has left
yesterday from FRANCE   with your Two consignment, but on know account
you should disclose to the Diplomats  the content of the TRUNK BOXES
because he will deliver to you and go back with the trunk boxes.
Please send to me and forward the following information to the Diplomat .
1 Home Address
2 Your Direct Telephone Number
3 
Copy of your Id
So that the security Dept will send you the keys of your Trunk Box.
Contact the Diplomat now via his email bellow to know if they have
landed in your country and also give him your home address and
telephone number:
CONTACT HIM IMMEDIATLY.
NAME: DIPLOMAT WILLIAM JOHNSON.
Email  : 
diplomatwilliam2022@gmail.com
Attach is picture of your RAW GOLD.
Regards
Mr. Nicolas de Rivière
Permanent Representative of France to the United Nations

subject: Re: Mr. Nicolas de Rivière
body:
Hello Mr. Nicolas de Rivi re,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my contract fund. I appreciate the update on the payment process. However, I have a few questions before I proceed further.

1. Could you please provide more details about the RAW GOLD AND CASH Diplomat? How can I be sure that this person is authorized to handle my funds?

2. Is there a specific reason why I should not disclose the content of the TRUNK BOXES to the Diplomat? What measures are in place to ensure the safety and security of my funds?

3. Can you please explain why you require my home address, direct telephone number, and a copy of my ID? What will these be used for?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Susan
